resources.string: Wait for Button Hit after reading
Replace graphics with texts for Apps like Talkback.
Does not work with all devices!

"The unofficial Android app for the Libre sensor.

Currently still in development.

If you think this app worth money, please go to my Homepage and support me!

You have questions, suggestions or feedback? write me:"

"Because currently approved CGM devices are not as accurate and reliable as standard blood glucose meters, users should confirm glucose levels with a meter before making a change in treatment.

 This resource is not designed for diagnostic or treatment purposes.

 This is not the official Libre Andoid App. The Developer of this App are not liable for damages that may arise during reading the sensor or because of incorrect values.

 Displayed values may differ from the actual blood sugar.

 Currently still in development!"
Verify the displayed value with a Glucose meter!
